Question
========
  
Research results have revealed that intelligence in the Netherlands is normally distributed. The mean IQ score is 100 with a standard deviation of 15. Maaike has an IQ-score of 92.5. What percentage of people in the Netherlands will have an IQ lower than that of Maaike?

  
Answerlist
----------
* 48.01 %
* 69.15 % 
* 30.85 % 
* 51.99 %

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
